item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome! The idea behind this blog is to keep track of whatever I’m testing at home. I will probably start with how did the setup of HUGO for the blog which is pretty much straight forward to be honest. Learning curve I really expect to have a huge learning curve just because I’ve never done such a thing and also because I’m a real “test and failure” person! Most common topics rpi open source packages monitoring NAS NFS SMB Sync the phone on the NAS Big etc!
